meanings.definition: A person or animal of unmixed ancestry.
meanings.sent1: The pureblood dog had no mixed breeds in its family tree.
meanings.sent2: The pureblood horse came from a long line of purebred ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The pureblood cat proudly displayed its heritage at the animal show.
meanings.sent4: In the world of purebloods, lineage was everything.
meanings.sent5: The pureblood wolf stood out among the pack with its pristine bloodline.

meanings.definition: Free from any adulterating or modifying element.
meanings.sent1: The pureblood diamond sparkled with unmatched clarity.
meanings.sent2: The pureblood gold was highly sought after for its purity.
meanings.sent3: The pureblood water from the mountain spring tasted like liquid perfection.
meanings.sent4: Her pureblood intentions were evident in every action she took.
meanings.sent5: The pureblood snow on the mountaintop glistened in the sunlight.
